onDeregistration.description: Indicates how the GWLB handles existing flows when a target is deregistered. Possible values are `rebalance` and `no_rebalance`. Must match the attribute value set for `on_unhealthy`. Default: `no_rebalance`.

onUnhealthy.description: Indicates how the GWLB handles existing flows when a target is unhealthy. Possible values are `rebalance` and `no_rebalance`. Must match the attribute value set for `on_deregistration`. Default: `no_rebalance`.
